pipe.label: Pipe
pipe.tooltip: The path to a named pipe to use for connection to a local server

socket.label: Socket
socket.tooltip: The path to a Unix socket to use for connection to a local server

port.label: Port
port.tooltip: The TCP/IP port number to use for connection

no-beep.label: No Beep
no-beep.tooltip: Turn off the beep on error

skip-networking.label: Skip Networking
skip-networking.tooltip: Don't listen on a TCP/IP port

shared-memory-base-name.label: Shared Memory Base Name
shared-memory-base-name.tooltip: The base name for shared memory connections

socket.label: Socket
socket.tooltip: The path to a Unix socket to use for connection to a local server

named-pipe-full-access-group.label: Named Pipe Full Access Group
named-pipe-full-access-group.tooltip: The group with full access to named pipe connections

port.label: Port
port.tooltip: The TCP/IP port number to use for connection

basedir.label: Base Directory
basedir.tooltip: The path to the MySQL installation directory

datadir.label: Data Directory
datadir.tooltip: The path to the database root directory

character-set-server.label: Character Set Server
character-set-server.tooltip: The default character set for new databases and tables

authentication_policy.label: Authentication Policy
authentication_policy.tooltip: The multi-factor authentication policy for MySQL

default-storage-engine.label: Default Storage Engine
default-storage-engine.tooltip: The default storage engine for new tables

sql-mode.label: SQL Mode
sql-mode.tooltip: The SQL modes for MySQL operations

log-output.label: Log Output
log-output.tooltip: The format of the general query and slow query logs

general-log.label: General Log
general-log.tooltip: Enable or disable the general query log. 0=Off, 1=On

general_log_file.label: General Log File
general_log_file.tooltip: The path to the general query log file

slow-query-log.label: Slow Query Log
slow-query-log.tooltip: Enable or disable the slow query log. 0=Off, 1=On

slow_query_log_file.label: Slow Query Log File
slow_query_log_file.tooltip: The path to the slow query log file

long_query_time.label: Long Query Time
long_query_time.tooltip: The time in seconds to consider a query as slow

log-error.label: Error Log File
log-error.tooltip: The path to the error log file

log-bin.label: Binary Log File
log-bin.tooltip: The base name for binary log files

server-id.label: Server ID
server-id.tooltip: A unique identifier for the server in replication setups

lower_case_table_names.label: Lower Case Table Names
lower_case_table_names.tooltip: Configures case sensitivity for table and database names 0=Case-sensitive, 1=Lowercase, 2=Uppercase

secure-file-priv.label: Secure File Privilege Directory
secure-file-priv.tooltip: Restricts file import/export operations to the specified directory

max_connections.label: Max Connections
max_connections.tooltip: The maximum number of concurrent connections allowed

table_open_cache.label: Table Open Cache
table_open_cache.tooltip: The number of open tables for all threads

temptable_max_ram.label: TempTable Max RAM
temptable_max_ram.tooltip: The maximum memory for temporary tables

tmp_table_size.label: Temporary Table Size
tmp_table_size.tooltip: The maximum size for in-memory temporary tables

internal_tmp_mem_storage_engine.label: Temporary Memory Storage Engine
internal_tmp_mem_storage_engine.tooltip: The storage engine for internal temporary tables

myisam_max_sort_file_size.label: MyISAM Max Sort File Size
myisam_max_sort_file_size.tooltip: The maximum size for temporary files during MyISAM index creation

myisam_sort_buffer_size.label: MyISAM Sort Buffer Size
myisam_sort_buffer_size.tooltip: The buffer size for sorting MyISAM indexes

key_buffer_size.label: MyISAM Key Buffer Size
key_buffer_size.tooltip: The size of the buffer for MyISAM index blocks

read_buffer_size.label: MyISAM Read Buffer Size
read_buffer_size.tooltip: The buffer size for sequential scans on MyISAM tables

read_rnd_buffer_size.label: MyISAM Random Read Buffer Size
read_rnd_buffer_size.tooltip: The buffer size for random reads from MyISAM tables

innodb_data_home_dir.label: InnoDB Home Directory
innodb_data_home_dir.tooltip: The path to the InnoDB data files

innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit.label: InnoDB Flush Log at Commit
innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit.tooltip: Controls InnoDB log flushing at transaction commit 0=No, 1=Yes, 2=Every second

innodb_log_buffer_size.label: InnoDB Log Buffer Size
innodb_log_buffer_size.tooltip: The size of the buffer for InnoDB log writes

innodb_buffer_pool_size.label: InnoDB Buffer Pool Size
innodb_buffer_pool_size.tooltip: The size of the InnoDB buffer pool for caching data and indexes. Recommend 50%-70% of total RAM

innodb_redo_log_capacity.label: InnoDB Redo Log Capacity
innodb_redo_log_capacity.tooltip: The size of the redo log files for InnoDB

innodb_thread_concurrency.label: InnoDB Thread Concurrency
innodb_thread_concurrency.tooltip: Limits the number of threads executing in InnoDB

innodb_autoextend_increment.label: InnoDB Autoextend Increment
innodb_autoextend_increment.tooltip: The increment size for extending auto-extend tablespaces

innodb_buffer_pool_instances.label: InnoDB Buffer Pool Instances
innodb_buffer_pool_instances.tooltip: The number of buffer pool instances for InnoDB

innodb_concurrency_tickets.label: InnoDB Concurrency Tickets
innodb_concurrency_tickets.tooltip: The concurrency tickets for InnoDB threads

innodb_old_blocks_time.label: InnoDB Old Blocks Time
innodb_old_blocks_time.tooltip: The time before moving a block to the new sublist in InnoDB

innodb_stats_on_metadata.label: InnoDB Stats on Metadata
innodb_stats_on_metadata.tooltip: Enable or disable updating InnoDB stats on metadata queries

innodb_file_per_table.label: InnoDB File Per Table
innodb_file_per_table.tooltip: Enable individual tablespace files for InnoDB tables

innodb_checksum_algorithm.label: InnoDB Checksum Algorithm
innodb_checksum_algorithm.tooltip: The checksum algorithm for InnoDB tables 0=none, 1=crc32, 2=strict_crc32, 3=innodb, 4=strict_innodb, 5=none

flush_time.label: Flush Time
flush_time.tooltip: The interval for flushing tables to disk

join_buffer_size.label: Join Buffer Size
join_buffer_size.tooltip: The buffer size for joins and index scans

max_allowed_packet.label: Max Allowed Packet Size
max_allowed_packet.tooltip: The maximum packet size for communication buffers

max_connect_errors.label: Max Connection Errors
max_connect_errors.tooltip: The maximum allowed failed connection attempts before blocking

open_files_limit.label: Open Files Limit
open_files_limit.tooltip: The number of open file descriptors allowed for MySQL

sort_buffer_size.label: Sort Buffer Size
sort_buffer_size.tooltip: The buffer size for ORDER BY and GROUP BY operations

binlog_row_event_max_size.label: Binlog Row Event Max Size
binlog_row_event_max_size.tooltip: The maximum size for a row-based binary log event

sync_source_info.label: Sync Source Info
sync_source_info.tooltip: The sync interval for source info in replication

sync_relay_log.label: Sync Relay Log
sync_relay_log.tooltip: The sync interval for relay log in replication

mysqlx_port.label: MySQL X Protocol Port
mysqlx_port.tooltip: The port for MySQL X Protocol connections
